Package utility

Class TimeMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • utility.TimeMethods
  • public class TimeMethods
extends java.lang.Object
    The TimeMethods class holds utility methods related to time used throughout the application.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Mary Williams

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TimeMethods()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static boolean checkOutsideBusHours​(java.time.LocalDateTime appointmentStart, java.time.LocalDateTime appointmentEnd)
      The checkOutsideBusHours method checks if two LocalDateTimes are outside of business hours in EST time.
      static boolean checkSameDay​(java.time.LocalDateTime appointmentStart, java.time.LocalDateTime appointmentEnd)
      The checkSameDay method checks if two LocalDateTimes are in the same day in EST time.
      static java.time.LocalTime getLocalBusinessEnd()
      The getLocalBusinessEnd method returns a LocalTime with the End of business hours (10pm EST) set to the Local Time Zone.
      static java.time.LocalTime getLocalBusinessStart()
      The getLocalBusinessStart method returns a LocalTime with the Start of business hours (8am EST) set to the Local Time Zone.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • checkSameDay

        public static boolean checkSameDay​(java.time.LocalDateTime appointmentStart,
                                   java.time.LocalDateTime appointmentEnd)
        The checkSameDay method checks if two LocalDateTimes are in the same day in EST time.
        Parameters:
        appointmentStart - The appointment start time to test against the appointment end time.
        appointmentEnd - The appointment end time to test against the appointment start time.
        Returns:
        A true/false value indicating the two LocalDateTimes are the same day or not.

      • checkOutsideBusHours

        public static boolean checkOutsideBusHours​(java.time.LocalDateTime appointmentStart,
                                           java.time.LocalDateTime appointmentEnd)
        The checkOutsideBusHours method checks if two LocalDateTimes are outside of business hours in EST time.
        Parameters:
        appointmentStart - The appointment start time to test against business hours.
        appointmentEnd - The appointment end time to test against business hours.
        Returns:
        A true/false value indicating whether the two LocalDateTimes are outside of business hours or not.

      • getLocalBusinessStart

        public static java.time.LocalTime getLocalBusinessStart()
        The getLocalBusinessStart method returns a LocalTime with the Start of business hours (8am EST) set to the Local Time Zone.
        Returns:
        The LocalTime equal to the Start of business hours; 8am EST.

      • getLocalBusinessEnd

        public static java.time.LocalTime getLocalBusinessEnd()
        The getLocalBusinessEnd method returns a LocalTime with the End of business hours (10pm EST) set to the Local Time Zone.
        Returns:
        The LocalTime equal to the End of business hours; 10pm EST.
